comments:
Driver:  0615I

Create Tomcat server runtime (make sure the Tomcat install points to JDK 1.5).

The bottom-up Web service can be deployed to Axis 1.2 properly (Axis 1.2 
support in defect 98340) using Tomcat 5.5 but the client scenario failed with 
an NPE.

Deferring to M6 since it doesn't look like we'll be moving to Axis 1.2 in M5.
This is an Axis 1.2 issue, so it is being deferred to M8.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 103796 ***
